spaceships

Class Spaceship

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceships.Spaceship
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo

    public abstract class Spaceship
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract class that sets up characteristics for different spaceship levels

        Parameters:

        level - - level of the spaceship
        capacity - - inventory capacity
        members - - members on the spaceship
        food - - food in the spaceship

        speed - - speed of the spaceship
